about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, Veefin Solutions Limited is a Digital Lending and Supply Chain Finance (SCF) technology product solutions company based in Mumbai.

Veefin Solutions has two main segments:

  1. Supply Chain Finance Technology Solutions; and
  2. Digital Lending Suite Solutions

The Supply Chain Finance Solutions segment is focused on providing technology-driven financing solutions that can streamline supply chain financing processes and help businesses manage their cash flow more effectively.

The Digital Lending Suite Solutions segment is designed to provide financial institutions with a comprehensive suite of solutions that help them improve their lending operations and deliver a better customer experience.

Veefin Solutions' client list includes Banks, Non-Banking Financial Institutions, FinTech, Marketplaces, and Corporates such as Yes Bank, IndusInd Bank, Indian Bank, Citi Bank, BRAC, VP Bank, Riyadh Bank, Aditya Birla Capital, Mintifi, Ambit Finvest, and others.

The company was awarded the "Most Innovative Supply Chain Finance Solution" at the Fintech India Summit & Awards, 2022, and "Solution of the Year 2021; SCF" at the Inflection Web Conference by Alden Global, CSCMP, SIMM & NASSCOM.

faqs.question: What is the Veefin Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Veefin Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 5699200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹46.73 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹82 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on June 22, 2023, and closes on June 26, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Veefin Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Veefin Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Veefin Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Veefin Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Veefin Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Veefin Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Veefin Solutions IPO opens on June 22, 2023 and closes on June 26, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Veefin Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Veefin Solutions IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,31,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Veefin Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Veefin Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Veefin Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Veefin Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, June 30, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 4, 2023. Check the Veefin Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Veefin Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Veefin Solutions IPO listing date is on Wednesday, July 5, 2023.
